column18: Missile Design and Performance
column19: Platform Integration
column20: Cueing and Detection

column18: AIM-120D-3 features active radar homing, two-way datalink, GPS-aided navigation, and Mach 4 speed for 180 km range with high Pk at NEZ; AIM-260 doubles range to ~200+ km via advanced propulsion and stealthy design for "kick-the-door-down" strikes.
column19: Seamlessly integrates with F-22/F-35 internal bays and F-15EX pylons, enabling 6-8 loads per jet with full fire-and-forget autonomy.
column20: E-3G/E-7A AEWCS provide 400-450 km radar horizons; GAN-LR ground radars and sat-links enable networked targeting via Link-16 for pre-launch updates, extending effective engagement to 250 km. Advanced multi-domain integration via Link-16 and GPS-denied sat-cueing boosts A/D.

column18: R-77M uses active radar with 200 km range, Mach 4 speed, and improved ECCM for high Pk; R-37M hypersonic (Mach 5+) variant with jettisonable booster achieves 300-400 km range for intercepting high-value targets like AWACS.
column19: Heavy Su-35S/Su-57 carry 4-6 R-37Ms externally, with Su-30SM2 adding multi-role flexibility via datalink updates for mid-course guidance.
column20: A-100 AWACS (400 km) and Podsolnukh-E OTH radars (600 km) feed targeting data, enabling lofted launches and 350 km effective envelope against non-maneuvering targets. OTH radar extensions and hypersonic missile kinematics boost C/D.

column18: PL-15 dual-pulse rocket motor, AESA seeker, Mach 5 speed for 200-300 km range with high NEZ Pk; PL-21 ramjet variant extends to 300+ km for anti-AWACS roles.
column19: J-20's internal bays carry 4-6 PL-15s stealthily; J-35A adds conformal loads for sustained BVR without drag penalty.
column20: KJ-3000 AEW (450 km) and P-band GAN radars (500 km) provide mid-course updates via indigenous datalinks, achieving 280 km effective range. Indigenous datalinks and P-band OTH radars enhance A/C/D integration.

column18: AIM-120D-3 active radar, two-way datalink, 180 km range, Mach 4 speed; Rampage ALBM adds 250 km stand-off for suppression.
column19: F-35I internal bays for 4 AIM-120s; F-15IA wing pylons for mixed loads with seamless ELINT fusion.
column20: G-550 CAEW (400 km) and Green Pine (800 km) radars enable networked cueing, extending to 200 km via sat-links. Multi-domain cueing (e.g., Green Pine's extended radar horizon enhancing A and D scores).

column18: Meteor ramjet, Mach 4+, 150-200 km range with large NEZ; AIM-120D-3 complements with 180 km active radar.
column19: Typhoon carries 4-6 Meteors externally; F-35B internal for stealthy loads.
column20: E-7D AEW (400 km) and Type-45 radars (400 km) via Link-16 for 200 km envelope.

column18: AIM-120D-3 active radar, two-way datalink, 180 km range; NSM anti-ship adds 185 km multi-role.
column19: F-35A internal bays for 4 AIM-120s; Super Hornet external loads with E-7A cueing.
column20: E-7A (450 km) and JORN OTH (3,000 km) for vast area coverage, 220 km effective via Link-16. JORN's OTH boosts A/D in Pacific theater.

column18: AAM-4B active radar, 105 km; AIM-120D-3 180 km datalink.
column19: F-35A internal; F-15J upgraded pylons for mixed loads.
column20: E-767 (400 km) and JTPS-P14 (450 km) radars via indigenous links for 190 km. Strong sensor fusion in East Asia.

column18: AIM-120D-3 180 km active; LIG Nex1 indigenous 150 km AESA.
column19: F-35A internal; KF-21/F-15K external with datalink integration.
column20: E-737 (400 km) and Green Pine (800 km) for 180 km networked. Korean-US fusion enhances D.

column18: Meteor ramjet, Mach 4+, 150 km large NEZ.
column19: Gripen E internal/external for 6 Meteors, full autonomy.
column20: GlobalEye (450 km) for 170 km engagements. Saab's integrated ecosystem boosts A/C/D.

column18: Meteor 150 km ramjet; AIM-120C-7 120 km active.
column19: Typhoon/F-35 mixed loads via Link-16.
column20: G550 CAEW (400 km) for 160 km. NATO integration aids D.

column18: Meteor ramjet 150 km; MICA-EM 80 km active.
column19: Rafale internal 4 Meteors; Mirage external.
column20: E-2D (400 km) for 155 km. French datalinks strong in A/D.

column18: AIM-120C-7 120 km datalink.
column19: CF-18 external; F-35A internal.
column20: E-3A (400 km) for 150 km via Link-16. NORAD integration boosts D.

column18: Meteor 150 km ramjet; AIM-120C-5 105 km active.
column19: Eurofighter 4 Meteors external; Tornado SEAD support.
column20: E-3A (400 km) for 150 km engagements. Tornado SEAD role enhances E in mixed ops.

column18: AIM-120C-7 120 km active radar, Mach 4.
column19: F-16 Block 70 pylons for 6 loads; F-4E legacy support.
column20: E-7T (400 km) for 110 km engagements. Indigenous TF-X development prospects boost future F.

column18: PL-15E AESA, 145-200 km dual-pulse; AIM-120C-5 105 km active.
column19: J-10C/JF-17 internal/external loads; F-16 pylons.
column20: ZDK-03 (350 km) and H-8 GAN (450 km) via Sino-Pak links for 150 km. Sino-Pak datalink fusion aids D despite hybrid fleet.

column18: AIM-120C active radar homing, datalink mid-course, Mach 4, ~105 km range with good Pk at NEZ; Meteor ramjet, Mach 4+, 150 km large NEZ for extended engagements.
column19: F-16 MLU pylons for 6 AIM-120C loads; Gripen C/D internal/external for 4-6 Meteors with MS20 upgrades for mixed compatibility.
column20: Saab 340 Erieye AEW (450 km radar horizon) provides networked cueing via partial Link-16/Saab datalinks, enabling ~130 km effective BVR in SE Asian theater.

column18: AIM-120C-7 120 km datalink; Meteor 150 km ramjet.
column19: EF-18M external; Eurofighter mixed loads.
column20: E-3A (400 km) and GroundMaster (450 km) for 140 km. GroundMaster gap-fillers support A/D.

column18: Fakour-90 semi-active radar homing derived from AIM-54 Phoenix, Mach 5 speed, ~190 km range with moderate Pk at NEZ optimized for AWACS/high-value intercepts.
column19: F-14AM upgraded with indigenous avionics carries up to 6 Fakour-90s under fuselage; F-4E supports legacy Hawk-derived variants for mixed loads.
column20: Simorgh indigenous AEW (400 km radar horizon) and Ghadir OTH ground radars (up to 1,100 km claimed) provide cueing via limited datalinks, enabling ~190 km effective BVR despite sanctions constraints.

column18: Meteor ramjet 150 km NEZ; RVV-AE-PD 120 km active.
column19: Rafale 4 Meteors; Su-30MKI 8 RVV-AE external.
column20: Netra (250 km) and Falcon (400 km) limited by multi-vendor issues for 140 km. Multi-vendor non-integration (French/US/Russian) penalizes D/E.

column18: AIM-120C-7 120 km active; Meteor 150 km NEZ.
column19: F-15SA 8+ loads; Typhoon external.
column20: E-3A (400 km) for 140 km, limited by vendor mix. Vendor mix limits D cohesion.
